All Implemented Interfaces:
ConstJoltPhysicsObject, ConstShape, RefTarget, AutoCloseable, Comparable<JoltPhysicsObject>
public class StaticCompoundShape extends CompoundShape
A CompoundShape whose sub-shapes cannot be modified after the shape is constructed.
